DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigation determine relationship core stability core proprioception
DOC.detailed_description: As previous research report correlate SPARQtm method athletic performance McGill Side Bridge test core joint position error , study design pilot . The subject 's core stability measure SPARQtm method athletic performance McGill Side Bridge test core stability . Core proprioception determine use standard test proprioception , Joint Position Error ( JPE ) testing , Skill Technologies motion capture device . All participant receive SPARQtm method athletic performance testing , McGill Side Bridge test core stability core joint position error test twice , one week apart .
